          313. Edmund Y. Lam, Joseph W. Goodman, "A Mathematical Analysis of the DCT Coefficient Distributions for Images," In Optical Society of America Annual Meeting, sep. 1999.
          314. Edmund Y. Lam, Joseph W. Goodman, "Blind Image Deconvolution for Symmetric Blurs by Polynomial Factorization," In Congress of the International Commission for Optics, aug. 1999.
          315. Edmund Y. Lam, Joseph W. Goodman, "Iterative Blind Image Deconvolution in Space and Frequency Domains," In Sensors, Cameras, and Applications for Digital Photography, jan. 1999.

          Editorials

          1. Andrew R. Harvey, Oliver Cossairt, Jun Ke, Edmund Y. Lam, Prasanna Rangarajan, "Computational optical sensing and imaging: feature issue introduction," 2020.
          2. Edmund Y. Lam, "Golden anniversary of Fourier optics: guest editorial," 2019.
          3. Abbie T. Watnik, Andrew R. Harvey, Edmund Y. Lam, Prasanna Rangarajan, "Computational optical sensing and imaging: introduction," 2019.
          4. Edmund Y. Lam, Gisele Bennett, Christy Fernandez-Cull, David Gerwe, Michael Kriss, Zeev Zalevsky, "Imaging systems and signal recovery: introduction to feature issue," 2015.
          5. Edmund Y. Lam, Hamid Aghajan, Andrea Prati, Faisal Z. Qureshi, Vincent Tam, "Computational and smart cameras," 2013.
          6. Edmund Y. Lam, Shaun S. Gleason, Kurt S. Niel, "Quality control by artificial vision," 2010.
          7. Edmund Y. Lam, King-Shan Lui, Vincent W.L. Tam, "Image and video processing in wireless sensor networks," 2009.
          8. Michael Ng, Edmund Y. Lam, Chong-Sze Tong, "Superresolution imaging: Theory, algorithms and applications," 2007.
